text: viśvasiccavarē, strīkaḷe balaprayēāgattilūṭe anantarameṭukkān niṅṅaḷkkanuvādamilla. niṅṅaḷ avarkk nalkiya vivāhamūlyattilninn orubhāgaṁ taṭṭiyeṭukkānāyi niṅṅaḷavare pīḍippikkarut- avar prakaṭamāya durnaṭappil ērppeṭṭālallāte. avarēāṭ mān'yamāyi sahavasikkuka. athavā, niṅṅaḷavare veṟukkunnuveṅkil aṟiyuka: niṅṅaḷ veṟukkunna palatiluṁ allāhu dhārāḷaṁ nanma uḷkkeāḷḷicciṭṭuṇṭāvāṁ
